mapper.select: select balance from gas_account where infoNum = #{infoNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE gas_info SET order_count = order_count + 1 WHERE infoNum = #{infoNum}
mapper.select: SELECT price,phone,DATE_FORMAT(insertTime,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS insertTime FROM gas_account_flow WHERE infoNum = #{infoNum} ORDER BY insertTime DESC LIMIT ${(page-1)*pagesize},${pagesize}

SELECT go.phone, go.real_price, go.save_price, DATE_FORMAT(go.insertDate,'%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS insertDate FROM gas_order go LEFT JOIN gas_info gi ON go.info_id = gi.id where gi.infoNum = #{infoNum} ORDER BY insertDate desc limit 5
